name: Yojimbrawl
description: From the makers of Genital Jousting and Broforce comes a deadly serious local multiplayer samurai fighting game that recalls classic gameplay, where split second decision making and quick reflexes are the key to victory while the slightest misstep could lead to your demise. Set in a bleak, blood-splattered landscape where hope lives and dies by the sword, you and up to three combatants will fight to death and beyond. Master complex combos and gain newfound power with each reincarnation.
